site.title: Diflowy - Explore, Share, Download Dify Workflows in Diflowy
site.description: Explore, Share, Download, Host Dify workflow in Diflowy.

explore.description: You can explore workflows by categories. Then you can Live Preview and Import them to Dify in Diflowy.

share.description: You can share your workflow inspiration with others or just keep your workflows private in Private-Hosted mode.
share.sharetitle: Share Your WorkFlow Or Make It Private-Hosted
share.belowtitle: Whether sharing workflows publicly or keeping them privately, you can take advantage of Diflowy's useful features below.

feature.instantDes: Real-time preview of Workflow structures in Diflowy
feature.privateDes: Using Private-Hosted Mode to manage your private workflows with all features, keeping your Dify clean and organized

more.description: New to Diflowy or want to learn more about Dify, here‚Äôs a quick guide!

login.title: Login Diflowy
login.description: Once you log in to Diflowy, you can not only explore existing workflows but also upload, manage, and host your own. Whether public or private, Diflowy will help you handle all your workflows efficiently.
login.principle2: , storing only the limited information required for user identity verification.

explorepage.title: Explore Workflows
explorepage.description: Explore and import workflows to Dify immediately in Diflow.
explorepage.publicmsg: In Public Mode, all public workflows are available for everyone. When not logged in, you can only explore in this mode.
explorepage.privatemsg: In Private-Hosted Mode, Diflowy will become your personal Dify file manager. Only your own private workflows are available to you and others can't see them.
explorepage.uploadtext1: Feel free to upload and share them with everyone.
explorepage.uploadtext2: Or you can upload in Private-Hosted mode to make your Dify clean and organized.

uploadpage.title: Share Your Workflows
uploadpage.description: Upload your workflows to Diflowy, you can publish your workflows to everyone, or make them private for your private-hosted use.
uploadpage.loginhint: To ensure security, you need to Login before uploading.
uploadpage.fillhint: Alternatively, you can also fill out the form below, then it will be audited and uploaded later by administrator.
uploadpage.name: Workflow Name
uploadpage.notify1: Please complete the above fields in detail for the benefit of others.
uploadpage.notify2: Please confirm that you are the author and willing to share this workflow, or that it is freely shareable, and provide complete author information.
uploadpage.notify3: Ensure there is no private information (API keys, environment variables, etc.) before uploading.
uploadpage.previewhint: * The above is for preview only, any changes will not affect the file.

aboutpage.title: About Us
aboutpage.text1: We are a vibrant and Open-Source community dedicated to explore, share, download, and host Dify.AI workflows.
aboutpage.text2: We welcome all participation and contributions üëã
aboutpage.thanksto: Diflowy could not have been created without the support of the following projects:
aboutpage.how1: We welcome you to contact us by Email üëâ
aboutpage.how2: All Diflowy's code is Open-Source on
aboutpage.how3: If you have any questions or feedback, join our
aboutpage.rm2: Add workflow version management feature in v0.1.0
aboutpage.rm3: Add Private-Hosted Mode for workflows in v0.1.1
aboutpage.rm4: Add i18n support (EN, CN, JA) in v0.1.2
aboutpage.rm5: Implemente Google OAuth and email login
aboutpage.rm9: Other suggestions are welcome; please post them on our GitHub Discussions

workflow.description: You can preview, download or import the workflow to your Dify.
workflow.b1: Please check the security of the workflow.
workflow.b2: You might need to replace the LLM or API keys with yours.
workflow.b3: You might need to modify the workflow to fit your needs.
workflow.b4: If this workflow is being shared without the author's permission or copyright, please contact us immediately.
workflow.b5: If you find it useful, remember to thank the author!

user.title: User Center
user.description: In User Center you can manage your Dify workflows.
user.before: Please Login before entering the User Center.
